purpose: To streamline and automate the process of penetration testing by leveraging intelligent agents
principle: Utilizes Python-based automation scripts and AI models to simulate and execute penetration testing tasks
reusability: Designed with modular components that can be integrated into existing security workflows; provides APIs for customization and extension
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for complex network configurations and requires expert configuration
name: TARS
highlight: Automates and enhances penetration testing using AI-driven agents
